_ Getting start DbLauncher _

= Introduction =

DbLauncher is Launching Plugin for H2.

= Getting start =

  * In the Package Explorer, Select project. 
  * Select Properties from the project's context menu. 
  * Select DbLauncher in the project properties page.
    http://werkzeugkasten.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/werkzeugkasten.docs/html/images/dblauncher/propertypage.png
  * Check Use H2 Database 
  * Click OK 
  * You can start H2 Database by three way. 
    * Select DbLauncher > Start H2 Db Server from the project's context menu.
      http://werkzeugkasten.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/werkzeugkasten.docs/html/images/dblauncher/start_contextmenu.png
    * Select DbLauncher > Start H2 Db Server in the menu bar.
      http://werkzeugkasten.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/werkzeugkasten.docs/html/images/dblauncher/start_menubar.png
    * Click the Start H2 Db Server button in the toolbar.
      http://werkzeugkasten.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/werkzeugkasten.docs/html/images/dblauncher/start_toolbar.png
  * If Dblauncher start H2 Database successfully, project's icon and label is decorated.
    http://werkzeugkasten.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/werkzeugkasten.docs/html/images/dblauncher/running.png
  * You can stop H2 Database by same way to start. 
    * Select DbLauncher > Stop H2 Db Server from the project's context menu.
      http://werkzeugkasten.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/werkzeugkasten.docs/html/images/dblauncher/stop_contextmenu.png
    * Select DbLauncher > Stop H2 Db Server in the menu bar.
      http://werkzeugkasten.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/werkzeugkasten.docs/html/images/dblauncher/stop_menubar.png
    * Click the Stop H2 Db Server button in the toolbar.
      http://werkzeugkasten.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/werkzeugkasten.docs/html/images/dblauncher/stop_toolbar.png
